name: Ucsd-thesis
tagline: This is an effort to create the canonical LaTeX style for typesetting UCSD doctoral dissertations.
body:
## New package maintainer needed The ucsd-thesis project is in need of a new maintainer. The current maintainers, *diwakergupta* and *amicitas*, have graduated some years ago now, and would like to hand off project responsibility to someone currently still associated with UCSD. Please contact @amicitas if you are interested in taking over. ## Introduction This package contains a LaTeX class file and a template for a UCSD Ph. D. thesis. For instructions see the readme or the wiki pages:
(currently hosted at https://code.google.com/p/ucsd-thesis) * [GettingStarted Getting Started] * [TroubleShooting Troubleshooting] To generate the final PDF, it is recommended that the `pdflatex` command is used. If you require Unicode another method may be better suited, see the [AdvancedUsage Advanced Usage] wiki page.
For questions and comments go to the [ucsd-thesis Google group](http://groups.google.com/group/ucsd-thesis).

This project is maintained by UCSD graduate students. Let us know when you submit a thesis using this package. If you run into problems, let us know by using the issue tracker. If you need to contact the developers directly add _@gmail.com_ after our username. *** The class file in this project was originally adapted from: * http://sourceforge.net/projects/ucsd-thesis/ * http://math.ucsd.edu/~thesis/resources.html This package has been worked on by many many graduate students over the years. A partial list of authors can be found in the `AUTHORS` file.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
